taxon.author: Jackson, 1908
taxon.distribution: Tropical Asia. Introduced to North, Central, South America, Brazil, Britain, Netherlands, Germany, Egypt, Seychelles, Madagascar, Hawaii

referenceObject.reference: Jackson, A. R. (1908). On some rare arachnids captured during 1907. Transactions of the Natural History Society of Northumberland, Durham, and Newcastle-upon-Tyne  (N.S.) 3(1): 49-78, pl. 4.
